entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 8:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1 with patchy frost.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
